mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notice_board ( board_code, nickname, subject, contents, file, ip, readcount, reporting_date) VALUES ('NB', #{nickname}, #{subject},#{contents},#{file} ,#{ip} ,0,now())
mapper.select: SELECT no, board_code ,nickname,subject ,contents ,file ,ip, readcount ,DATE_FORMAT(reporting_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reporting_date FROM tbl_notice_board ORDER BY no desc limit #{pageStart} , #{perPageNum}
